articles.title: Param Vishisht Seva Medal for Olympic champion Subedar Neeraj Chopra - Times of India
articles.description: Off the field News: Subedar Neeraj Chopra, who created history last year by winning India's first athletics gold medal in Olympics, was awarded Param Vishisht Seva Medal
